ch0157_00_mache/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. How nice to see
you today.
ch0157_00_mache/0101_0701_02_10:
I hope that you will find things worth smiling
about today.
ch0157_00_mache/0601_0701_02_10:
I thought up these clothes thanks to Fairy-type
Pokémon. I wanted to be as graceful and elegant
as they are.
ch0157_00_mache/0601_0701_03_10:
Fairy-type Pokémon are more than just cute.
They’re mysterious and powerful creatures.
ch0157_00_mache/0601_0701_04_10: I wonder if there’s a word for that...
ch0157_00_mache/0601_0702_01_10:
The longer you spend with Fairy-type Pokémon,
the more you learn about them.
ch0157_00_mache/0601_0702_02_10:
They’re kind to new people, and they continue to
surprise, even when you spend every day
with them.
ch0157_00_mache/0601_0702_03_10:
Ha... I wonder how I could become a
Fairy-type Pokémon.
ch0157_00_mache/0602_0701_01_10:
I’ve been feeling a bit different ever since I
arrived on Pasio.
ch0157_00_mache/0602_0701_02_10:
It’s a bit hard for me to explain, but it’s like the
refreshing feeling of putting on a new dress.
ch0157_00_mache/0602_0701_03_10:
A change of environment can really change
how you feel, you know?
ch0157_00_mache/0602_0702_01_10:
You can get used to anything, but there is such a
thing as getting too used to something...
ch0157_00_mache/0602_0702_02_10: I suppose that’s difficult to explain with words.
ch0157_00_mache/0603_0701_01_10:
I’m the Gym Leader of the Laverre Gym in Kalos.
The badge I give out is called...
ch0157_00_mache/0603_0701_02_10: the Fairy Badge. It’s a really beautiful badge, too.
ch0157_00_mache/0603_0701_03_10:
The interior of my Gym is really cute. Just looking
at it is sure to put a smile on your face.
ch0157_00_mache/0603_0701_04_10:
The Gym is made up of several little rooms...
It’s made to look like a dollhouse!
ch0157_00_mache/0603_0702_01_10:
The Trainers in each room are dressed accordingly.
It’s like one big fashion show.
ch0157_00_mache/0603_0702_02_10:
Trainers who challenge the Gym have to use warp
panels to move from room to room.
ch0157_00_mache/0603_0702_03_10:
I would be glad to use those warp panels with
you someday.
ch0157_00_mache/0604_0701_01_10:
My partner Pokémon is truly elegant,
don’t you think?
ch0157_00_mache/0604_0701_02_10:
Back when he was an Eevee, he was so round
and cute.
ch0157_00_mache/0604_0701_03_10:
I cared for him every day, and we were
always together.
ch0157_00_mache/0604_0701_04_10:
The day Eevee evolved into Sylveon was a clear
and beautiful one. Sylveon was sparkling in
the sunlight.
ch0157_00_mache/0604_0702_01_10:
When things aren’t going well and I’m feeling
down on myself...
ch0157_00_mache/0604_0702_02_10:
Sylveon comes over and wraps his feelers around
my arms.
ch0157_00_mache/0604_0702_03_10:
Sylveon does this because he can understand
my feelings.
ch0157_00_mache/0604_0702_04_10:
In that moment, I think I was able to understand
Sylveon’s feelings of kindness, too.
ch0157_00_mache/0605_0701_02_10:
Every Trainer shares something in common with
their partner Pokémon, in one way or another.
ch0157_00_mache/0605_0701_03_10:
I wonder if Sylveon and I are a sync pair because
we’re similar to each other.
ch0157_00_mache/0605_0701_04_10:
The Trainers here on Pasio all seem to have come
with Pokémon that share similarities with them.
ch0157_00_mache/0605_0702_01_10:
If you became a Pokémon, I wonder which one
you’d be, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0157_00_mache/0605_0702_02_10:
I think you’d be a compassionate Pokémon that
gives everyone a reason to smile.
ch0157_00_mache/0605_0702_03_10:
If I ever did become a Pokémon too, I’d be happy
if we would keep being friends as Pokémon.
ch0157_00_mache/1701_0701_01_10:
Oh, if it isn’t a young Trainer... You’ve come at
quite the appropriate time.
ch0157_00_mache/1701_0701_02_10:
This is a gift from me to you. Be sure to use it
well, OK?
ch0157_00_mache/1701_0702_01_10:
I hope you like it. I’ll try to find something else for
you soon.
ch0157_00_mache/2501_0701_01_10:
Battling together with my Pokémon partner helps
us unify our thoughts and feelings. It feels like I’m
growing closer to becoming a Pokémon.
ch0157_00_mache/2501_0701_02_10:
But something is still missing for me to become
a Pokémon.
ch0157_00_mache/2501_0701_03_10:
Oh, what about you and I becoming a sync pair,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0157_00_mache/2501_0702_01_10: I think we could make for a good sync pair, but...
ch0157_00_mache/2501_0702_02_10:
But if we were, we wouldn’t be able to battle
each other anymore. It’s too bad—I really thought
it was a good idea.
ch0157_00_mache/2511_0701_01_10:
I designed the clothes I’m wearing with my desire
to become a Pokémon in mind.
ch0157_00_mache/2511_0701_02_10:
Whether in design or in Pokémon battles, learning
from the strengths of others is the way to grow
into the ideal you.
ch0157_00_mache/2511_0701_03_10:
Recently, I’ve been observing your techniques
in battles, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0157_00_mache/2511_0702_01_10:
Watching other people, you start to see their good
and bad points.
ch0157_00_mache/2511_0702_02_10:
I wonder how we Trainers look to our
partner Pokémon...
ch0157_00_mache/2511_0702_03_10:
If I were your Pokémon, I think I’d see
a lot of good things about you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0157_00_mache/3001_0701_01_10:
Nothing good comes from being hasty.
Try taking a deep breath... Stop and smell
the roses.
ch0157_00_mache/3002_0701_01_10:
I had a dream I was a Pokémon last night.
It was wonderful... Wait, what if this is the
dream and last night was reality?
ch0157_00_mache/3003_0701_01_10:
I’d love to design some new patterns based on
your Pokémon’s aesthetic. Would that be all right
with you?
ch0157_00_mache/3004_0701_01_10:
My long, fluttering sleeves are like the wings
of a butterfly Pokémon, don’t you think?
*giggle*
ch0157_00_mache/3005_0701_01_10:
Sometimes people ask me if I ever stop smiling,
and I have to wonder... Do I smile even while
I’m asleep?
ch0157_00_mache/3006_0701_01_10:
No need to push yourself tonight, young Trainer.
Tomorrow, the sun will shine and give us a new
reason to smile.
